sentences.sContent: a child’s attachment to its mother
The vacuum cleaner has various attachments.
sentences.sCn: 这台真空吸尘器有各种附件。

sentences.sContent: the attachments that secure your boots firmly to the skis
sentences.sCn: 把靴子牢牢固定在滑雪板上的扣件

sentences.sContent: ...or treating women's special attachment to home and family as a social injustice...
...Americans will have to put aside their own attachment to the idea of smaller government and less regulation...

synos.tran: [机]附件；依恋；连接物；扣押财产

phrases.pCn: 阀值；附着点；附保点；接合点

words.tran: 附加的；依恋的，充满爱心的
可附上的；可连接的；可逮捕的；可没收的
使依附；贴上；系上；使依恋

trans.tranOther: a feeling that you like or love someone or something and that you would be unhappy without them
